snippet: It seemed as if a kaleidoscope of colors had exploded on the runners participating in the five-borough New York City Marathon last Sunday.
abstract: Bill Cunningham captures some of the extraordinarily bright colors chosen by many runners who participated in the New York City Marathon.
lead_paragraph: It seemed as if a kaleidoscope of colors had exploded on the runners participating in the five-borough New York City Marathon last Sunday.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | New York City Marathon Medley
